GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with an object from the requested article_id of an array

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with array of object listing all the comments with the requested ID

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the requested article ID in the array with array

comments.body: I wake up in the morning thinking why do I even bother
comments.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes count in the article table requested by article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the row with the given comment_id in the url and no body is sent back as it is deleted
